title: 17 minute wait time in bronze?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: what the fuck are these wait times, im only bronze 3 60 lp is it just me or anyone else have this ?

replies.body: Hmm...this doesn't seem normal. Is this something that consistently happens or just a one-time thing?

This happens consistently across all ELO's, and there has been tons of complain threads about this. Because of how new draft treats players who play support, but do not main this role, there are less and less support players, so only people getting good queue times are support players.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IAfGgWHt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-21T19:24:23.501+0000)
>
> Hmm...this doesn't seem normal. Is this something that consistently happens or just a one-time thing?

It is happening more and more since Riot refuses to address the problem of Primary and Secondary roles and supports. 

I used to go Jungle / Support, but after 50 games of only ever getting Support (except when I was on a premade) I changed to Jungle / Top.  The pool of support players is drying up, thus wait times are increasing.

Queued Jungle/Support got support in 5 seconds.

Queued Jungle/Top at for nearly 8 minutes before getting Jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IAfGgWHt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-21T19:24:23.501+0000)
>
> Hmm...this doesn't seem normal. Is this something that consistently happens or just a one-time thing?

Like the others said it's a side effect of a "Support Shortage".  If you don't choose support or fill(Which means you're being support 90% of the time) then you're going to see some extremely long queue times.
fix the wait time for rank bronze or disabled it
only 17 minutes ??   that is fast. me and 3 friends in ranked -- all picked fill  at  b5 --  took over ! FRIGGIN HOUR to get a game

i get this allot, thought it was normal. but apparently it's not.

usually it happens to me after people decline the match or afk or what ever reason returns you to the que.

After 10 minutes i just reque and then get a match within like 10 minutes
